Identification_Area.title: Bundle description for the tno-centaur_diam-albedo-density bundle

Citation_Information.description: This data set is a compilation of published diameters, albedos, and densities for Transneptunian Objects (TNOs) and Centaurs. A total of 194 objects are listed, many with more than one entry. This version covers published values through 31 March 2018.

Document.document_name: Bundle descripiton for the tno-centaur_diam-albedo-density bundle
Document.description: A document describing the content and structure of the bundle.

Document_Edition.description: A document describing the content and structure of the bundle.
